name: Rumble Dice Deluxe 🎲
description:
Hello ! Drag the 🎲 with your mouse or finger to another cell.

Make groups of dice with the same face to win the challenge of the Rumble Dice Deluxe !

Don't forget to let us a note and a comment!

A game made by Menica Folden and Monsieur Poire for the GMTK Jam 2022 !

Music for menu made by Kelias during the jam

Made with Construct 3

----

New records made after the end of the dev time :

  • Level 5 : doable in 3 mooves
  • Level 8 : doable in 5 mooves
